“\w My|strong="H5921"\w* lord,” said Abraham, “if \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H5674"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w*.

Meanwhile, \w Abraham|strong="H3947"\w* \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w selected|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tender|strong="H7390"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w choice|strong="H2896"\w* \w calf|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w hurried|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

“\w Where|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w your|strong="H8283"\w* wife \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w*?” they asked. “\w There|strong="H2009"\w*, in \w the|strong="H2009"\w* tent,” \w he|strong="H8283"\w* replied.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w surely|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w next|strong="H2416"\w* \w year|strong="H6256"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w wife|strong="H2416"\w* \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*!” \w Now|strong="H2009"\w* \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* behind \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w listening|strong="H8085"\w* \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* tent.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* Abraham \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* already \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* well along \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*; \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w passed|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w age|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* childbearing.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* she \w laughed|strong="H6711"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w herself|strong="H7130"\w*, saying, “\w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w worn|strong="H1086"\w* \w out|strong="H1086"\w* \w and|strong="H2204"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* master \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H1961"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H5730"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* Abraham, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w laugh|strong="H6711"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w Can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w really|strong="H2088"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w child|strong="H3205"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w am|strong="H2204"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*?’

\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w anything|strong="H1697"\w* \w too|strong="H1697"\w* \w difficult|strong="H6381"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w At|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*—\w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H6256"\w*—\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w denied|strong="H3584"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3372"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w laugh|strong="H6711"\w*.” “\w No|strong="H3808"\w*,” replied \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w laugh|strong="H6711"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H1980"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w leave|strong="H1980"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w looked|strong="H8259"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* Abraham \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* see \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w outcry|strong="H2201"\w* \w against|strong="H3513"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3966"\w* \w grievous|strong="H3513"\w*,

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* actions fully justify \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w outcry|strong="H6818"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* reached \w Me|strong="H4994"\w*. \w If|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H3045"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w*.”

Abraham stepped \w forward|strong="H5066"\w* \w and|strong="H5066"\w* said, “\w Will|strong="H6662"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w* really \w sweep|strong="H5595"\w* \w away|strong="H5595"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*?

\w Far|strong="H2486"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*—\w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w treated|strong="H6213"\w* \w alike|strong="H5973"\w*. \w Far|strong="H2486"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*! \w Will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Abraham \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w that|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* \w ventured|strong="H2974"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* Lord—though \w I|strong="H2009"\w* am \w but|strong="H6030"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w ashes|strong="H6083"\w*—

suppose \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w ones|strong="H6662"\w* \w lack|strong="H2637"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w*. \w Will|strong="H6662"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w for|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w lack|strong="H2637"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w*?” \w He|strong="H8033"\w* replied, “If \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* forty-five \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w*.”
